title: EP. 260 "You Snooze You Lose" with Kiki Said So & Medinah Monroe
description:
Time waits for no one, stop acting like it’s always gonna be there!

 

Cocktail: SEX IN THE HOT SPRINGS

Ingredients:
VODKA
MIDORI
GINGER ALE

Instructions

MIX IN COCKTAIL SHAKER AND STRAIN INTO A MARTINI GLASS

 

CRAVE GIVEAWAY- VESPER
SEND A COCKTALE ABOUT YOUR BEST EXPERIENCE WITH A TOY
SEND BY 10/31
FOLLOW @LOVECRAVE AND @COCKTALESPODCAST ON INSTAGRAM
INCLUDE YOUR IG HANDLE IN YOUR COCKTALE
WINNER WILL BE ANNOUNCED ON NOVEMBER 4TH!
MUST BE IN THE USA TO PARTICIPATE

 

Follow Us!

@kikisaidso
@coffeebeandean
